feat.name: Aberrant Dragonmark
entries: 你已经显现了一个异常的龙纹。确定它的外观和与之相关的缺陷。你获得以下好处。

items: You learn a {@filter cantrip of your choice from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=0|class=Sorcerer}. In addition, choose a {@filter 1st-level spell from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=1|class=Sorcerer}. You learn that spell and can cast it through your mark. Once you cast it, you must finish a short or long rest before you can cast it again through the mark. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
当你通过你的标记施展一级法术时，你可以消耗你的一个命中率骰子并进行滚动。如果你掷的是偶数，你会获得与掷出的数字相等的临时命中率。如果你掷出的是奇数，你周围30英尺内的一个随机生物（不包括你）会受到与掷出的数字相等的力量伤害。如果没有其他生物在范围内，你会受到伤害。

entries: 你还会从异端龙纹缺陷表中随机产生一个缺陷。

entries.caption: Aberrant Dragonmark Flaws
rows: 你的印记是身体持续疼痛的来源。
你的标记对你耳语。它的含义可能并不明确。
当你有压力时，这个标记会发出响亮的嘶嘶声。
印记周围的皮肤被烧伤，有鳞片，或枯萎。
动物在你身边感到不安。
你在使用你的标记时都会有情绪波动。
每当你使用这个标记时，你的容貌就会发生轻微的变化。
在你使用你的标记后，你会做可怕的恶梦。

entries.name: Option: Greater Aberrant Powers
entries: 根据DM的选择，拥有异端龙印特技的角色有机会表现出更大的力量。在达到10级时，这样的角色有{@chance 10|10 percent}的机会从第七章的选项中获得{@filter epic boon|rewards|type=boon}的{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}。如果该角色未能获得恩赐，他们在下次获得等级时有{@chance 10|10 percent}的机会。
如果这个角色获得了一个好处，DM会选择它或随机确定它。该角色也会永久地失去他们的一个命中率，他们的最大命中率会减少，减少的量等于掷出的那个骰子加上他们的宪法修改器（最小减少量为1）。这种减少是无法通过任何方式逆转的。

feat.name: Actor
entries: 擅长模仿和戏剧表演，你获得以下好处。

items: You have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Deception}) and Charisma ({@skill Performance}) checks when trying to pass yourself off as a different person.

You can mimic the speech of another person or the sounds made by other creatures. You must have heard the person speaking, or heard the creature make the sound, for at least 1 minute. A successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check contested by your Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check allows a listener to determine that the effect is faked.

feat.name: Adept of the Black Robes

feat: initiate of high sorcery|dsotdq|initiate of high sorcery (nuitari)

entries: 你选择了月亮Nuitari来影响你的魔法，你的野心和对黑袍会的忠诚得到了认可，赋予你这些好处。

items.name: Ambitious Magic
entries: 你学习一个你选择的二阶法术。该{@filter 2nd-level spell|spells|level=2|school=E;N}必须是来自魔法学派或死灵学派的魔法。你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放此特技的二阶法术，在你再次以这种方式施放之前，你必须完成一次长时间的休息。你也可以使用你所拥有的相应等级的法术槽来施放此法术。该法术的施法能力是你获得{@feat Initiate of High Sorcery|DSotDQ}特技时选择的。

items.name: Life Channel
entries: 你可以将你的生命力转化为你的魔法的力量。当你能看到的60英尺范围内的生物对你施放的造成伤害的法术的蓄力失败时，你可以消耗与该法术等级相等的命中率点数。滚动消耗的命中率并将它们加在一起。该生物所受的伤害会增加，其数量等于该总数。

feat.name: Adept of the Red Robes

feat: initiate of high sorcery|dsotdq|initiate of high sorcery (lunitari)

entries: 你选择了月亮Lunitari来影响你的魔法，你对维持万物平衡的奉献得到了红袍会的认可，给予你这些好处。

items.name: Insightful Magic
entries: 你学习一个你选择的二阶法术。该{@filter 2nd-level spell|spells|level=2|school=I;T}必须是来自幻术或转化术的魔法流派。你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放此特技的二阶法术，在你再次以这种方式施放之前，你必须完成一次长时间的休息。你也可以使用你所拥有的相应等级的法术槽来施放此法术。该法术的施法能力是你获得{@feat Initiate of High Sorcery|DSotDQ}特技时选择的。

items.name: Magical Balance
entries: When you make an attack roll or an ability check and roll a 9 or lower on the {@dice d20}, you can balance fate and treat the roll as a 10. You can balance fate in this way a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Adept of the White Robes

feat: initiate of high sorcery|dsotdq|initiate of high sorcery (solinari)

entries: 你选择了月亮Solinari来影响你的魔法，而你使用魔法使世界变得更美好的誓言也得到了白袍会的认可，赋予你这些好处。

items.name: Protective Magic
entries: 你学习一个你选择的2级法术。该{@filter 2nd-level spell|spells|level=2|school=A;D}必须来自咒语或占卜学派的魔法。你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放此特技的二阶法术，你必须在完成一个长时间的休息后才能再次以这种方式施放它。你也可以使用你所拥有的相应等级的法术槽来施放此法术。该法术的施法能力是你获得{@feat Initiate of High Sorcery|DSotDQ}特技时选择的。

items.name: Protective Ward
entries: 当你或你能看到的30英尺范围内的生物受到伤害时，你可以用你的反应来消耗一个法术槽，在目标周围编织保护性魔法。掷出与所消耗的法术槽等级相等的骰子数量，并将目标受到的伤害减少到这些骰子所掷出的总数+你的法术能力修改值。

feat.name: Adroit Crafter

otherSummary.entry: Proficiency in a skill or tool

entries: You've trained in crafting items using a skill or tool that you're proficient with, and the steps in crafting have become second nature to you. You gain the following benefits:

items: The time it takes to create an item using your proficient skills or tools is halved.
If you fail to successfully craft the item and would lose the components, you retain the components instead.

feat.name: Aerial Expert
entries: Years of practice or an innate talent have made you adept at gliding. You gain the following benefits:

items: You no longer need to move at least 10 feet to perform long and high jumps. You may choose whether the jump uses your Strength or Dexterity score for determining height or distance, and you double the distance you would normally leap in either case.
You may take the {@action Dash} action while gliding to fly an additional distance up to your movement speed.
You may change direction freely while gliding, and may gain up to 10 feet of altitude once before you finish your descent.

feat.name: Agent of Order

feat: scion of the outer planes|sato|scion of the outer planes (lawful outer plane)

entries: You can channel cosmic forces of order to gain these benefits:

items.name: Stasis Strike
entries: Once per turn, when you damage a creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself, you can deal an extra {@damage 1d8} force damage to the target, and it must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the modifier of the spellcasting ability you chose for the Scion of the Outer Planes feat) as spectral bindings try to ensnare it. On a successful save, the target escapes. On a failed save, the target has the restrained condition until the start of your next turn. These bindings manifest as chains or some other symbol of stasis. You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Alert
entries: 始终保持对危险的警惕，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你获得一个+5的主动性奖励。
You can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} while you are conscious.
其他生物不会因为不被你看见而在对你的攻击卷中获得优势。

feat.name: Artificer Initiate
entries: 你已经学会了一些工匠的发明能力。

items: You learn one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter artificer spell list|spells|level=0;1|class=artificer}, and you learn one 1st-level spell of your choice from {@filter that list|spells|level=0;1|class=artificer}. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放此特技的一级法术，在你再次以这种方式施放之前，你必须完成一次长时间的休息。你也可以使用你拥有的任何法术槽来施放该法术。

You gain proficiency with one type of {@filter artisan's tools|items|type=artisan's tools} of your choice, and you can use that type of tool as a spellcasting focus for any spell you cast that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability.

feat.name: Athlete
entries: 你经历了大量的体能训练，获得了以下好处。

items: 当你是{@condition prone}时，站起来只用5英尺的移动距离。
攀登并不花费你的额外移动。
你可以在步行时只移动5英尺，而不是10英尺后进行跑步跳远或跑步跳高。

feat.name: Baleful Scion

feat: scion of the outer planes|sato|scion of the outer planes (evil outer plane)

entries: You can channel cosmic forces of evil to gain these benefits:

items.name: Grasp of Avarice
entries: Once per turn, when you damage a creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself, you can also deal necrotic damage to it. The necrotic damage equals {@dice 1d6} + your proficiency bonus, and you regain a number of hit points equal to this necrotic damage dealt. You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Bandit Cunning
entries: Your time as a bandit has granted you a sense for danger, and made you skilled at sizing up opponents. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you are asked to make a saving throw, you may spend your reaction to add your Intelligence modifier as an additional bonus to the saving throw. You cannot use this ability again until you have completed a long rest.

During combat, you can use your action to make an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check against any creature you have seen fight. As long as you succeed against a DC of 10 + their challenge rating, you can learn one useful fact of your choice about the target's combat abilities. Choose from:
one damage resistance or immunity
one condition immunity
one special ability possessed by the creature that either does damage, or prevents damage
one option under their attack, legendary, or reaction actions
one special sense they possess

feat.name: Bountiful Luck
entries: Your people have extraordinary luck, which you have learned to mystically lend to your companions when you see them falter. You're not sure how you do it; you just wish it, and it happens. Surely a sign of fortune's favor!

When an ally you can see within 30 feet of you rolls a 1 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to let the ally reroll the die. The ally must use the new roll.
When you use this ability, you can't use your Lucky racial trait before the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Careful Crafter

otherSummary.entry: Proficiency in a skill or tool

entries: You've trained in crafting items using a skill or tool that you're proficient with, and your creations are known for being well made and reliable. You gain the following benefits:

items: You make all ability checks for crafting with advantage.
Anyone assisting you in crafting an item gains advantage on their ability checks for crafting.
If you fail to successfully craft the item, the amount of time it took to complete the process is halved.

feat.name: Cartomancer
entries: You have learned to channel your magic through a deck of cards. You can use a card deck as your spellcasting focus, and you gain the following benefits:

items.name: Card Tricks
entries: You learn the {@spell Prestidigitation} cantrip and can use it to create illusions that duplicate the effects of stage magic. When you use {@spell Prestidigitation} in this way, you can conceal the verbal and somatic components of the spell as ordinary conversation and card handling.

items.name: Hidden Ace
entries: When you finish a long rest, you can choose one spell from your class's spell list and imbue that spell into a card. The chosen spell must have a casting time of 1 action, and it must be a level for which you have spell slots. The card remains imbued with this spell for 8 hours. While the card is imbued with the spell, you can use a bonus action to flourish the card and cast the spell within. The card then immediately loses its magic.

feat.name: Charger
entries: When you use your action to {@action Dash}, you can use a bonus action to make one melee weapon attack or to {@action shove} a creature.
如果你在采取这个奖励行动之前立即在一条直线上移动至少10英尺，你要么在攻击的伤害卷上获得+5的奖励（如果你选择进行近战攻击并击中），要么将目标推离你最多10英尺（如果你选择推搡并且成功）。

feat.name: Chef
entries: 掌握烹饪艺术的时间得到了回报，赋予了你以下的好处。

items: You gain proficiency with {@item cook's utensils|phb} if you don't already have it.

As part of a short rest, you can cook special food, provided you have ingredients and {@item cook's utensils|phb} on hand. You can prepare enough of this food for a number of creatures equal to 4 + your proficiency bonus. At the end of the short rest, any creature who eats the food and spends one or more Hit Dice to regain hit points regains an extra {@dice 1d8} hit points.
通过一小时的工作或完成长时间的休息，你可以烹制与你的熟练度奖励相等数量的食物。这些特殊的食物在制作后可以持续8小时。一个生物可以使用一个额外的行动来吃其中的一个，以获得与你的熟练度加成相等的临时命中率。

feat.name: Cohort of Chaos

feat: scion of the outer planes|sato|scion of the outer planes (chaotic outer plane)

entries: You can channel cosmic forces of chaos to gain these benefits:

items.name: Chaotic Flare
entries: When you roll a 1 or a 20 on an attack roll or a saving throw, the magic of chaos flows through you. Roll a d4 and consult the Chaotic Flares table to determine what happens. A flare lasts until the end of your next turn, and a new flare can't occur until after the first flare ends.

entries.caption: Chaotic Flares
rows: {@b Battle Fury.} A creature of your choice that you can see is filled with reckless fury. It has advantage on attack rolls and disadvantage on ability checks.

{@b Disruption Field.} Waves of energy ripple around you. Every creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of you, or that moves into that area for the first time on a turn, takes {@damage 1d8} force damage.

{@b Unbound.} When you move, you can use some or all of your walking speed to teleport yourself once, along with any equipment you're wearing or carrying, up to the distance used to an unoccupied space that you can see.
{@b Wailing Winds.} Winds swirl in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on you. You and any other creatures in that area have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws.

feat.name: Crossbow Expert
entries: 由于广泛地练习了十字弓，你获得了以下好处。

items: 你忽略了你所精通的十字弓的装载质量。
在敌对生物的5英尺范围内，不会对你的远程攻击卷轴造成不利影响。
When you use the {@action Attack} action and attack with a one-handed weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with a {@item hand crossbow|phb} you are holding.

feat.name: Cruel
entries: The challenges and struggles you've faced throughout your life have led you to delight in inflicting pain and anguish upon others. You gain a number of cruelty dice equal to your proficiency bonus. Your cruelty dice are {@dice d6|d6s}. You can roll only one cruelty die per turn, and a cruelty die is spent when you roll it.
You can roll a cruelty die under any of the following circumstances, with the indicated result:

items: When you deal damage to a creature, spend one cruelty die to deal extra damage to the creature equal to the roll.
When you score a critical hit, spend one cruelty die to gain temporary hit points equal to the roll.
When you make a Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) check, spend one cruelty die and add the roll to your check.

entries: You regain all spent cruelty dice when you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|long rest}.

feat.name: Crusher
entries: 你练就了粉碎敌人的艺术，使你获得以下好处。

items: 每回合一次，当你用攻击击中一个生物并造成破坏性伤害时，你可以将它移动5英尺到一个无人的空间，只要目标不比你大一号。
当你的关键一击对一个生物造成打击伤害时，在你下一回合开始前，对该生物的攻击卷轴具有优势。

feat.name: Defensive Duelist
entries: 当你挥舞着你精通的精巧武器，而另一个生物用近身攻击击中你时，你可以用你的反应将你的精通加成加到你的攻击力上，有可能导致攻击错过你。

feat.name: Divinely Favored
entries: 一个神选择了你来携带他们力量的火花。

You learn one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter cleric spell list|spells|level=0|class=cleric} and one 1st-level spell based on the alignment of your character, as specified in the Alignment Spells table below. You also learn the {@spell augury} spell.

You can cast the chosen 1st-level spell and the {@spell augury} spell without a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast either of these spells in this way again. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
你对这个特技的法术的施法能力是智力、智慧或魅力（在你选择这个特技时选择）。
此外，你可以使用一个神圣的符号作为你施展的任何法术的施法焦点，这些法术使用你在选择此特技时选择的施法能力。

feat.name: Dragon Fear
entries: 当被激怒时，你会散发出威胁的气息。你获得以下好处。

items: Instead of exhaling destructive energy, you can expend a use of your Breath Weapon trait to roar, forcing each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier). A target automatically succeeds on the save if it can't hear or see you. On a failed save, a target becomes {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. If the {@condition frightened} target takes any damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

feat.name: Dragon Hide
entries: 你表现出的鳞片和爪子让人联想到你的龙人祖先。你获得以下好处。

items: 你的鳞片变硬。当你没有穿戴盔甲时，你可以将你的反击力计算为13+你的灵巧修正值。你可以使用一个盾牌，并仍然获得这个好处。
你从你的手指尖长出可伸缩的爪子。伸出或缩回爪子不需要任何行动。爪子是天然的武器，你可以用它来进行徒手攻击。如果你用它们攻击，你会造成相当于{@dice 1d4}+你力量修正值的砍击伤害，而不是普通的徒手攻击的破坏伤害。

feat.name: Drow High Magic
entries: 你学会了更多黑暗精灵的典型魔法。你学会了{@spell detect magic}法术，并且可以随意施放，不需要消耗一个法术槽。你还学会了（1%）和（2%），每一个你都可以在不消耗法术槽的情况下施放一次。当你完成一次长时间的休息后，你会重新获得以这种方式施放这两个法术的能力。魅力是你对所有三种法术的施法能力。

feat.name: Dual Wielder
entries: 你掌握了用两种武器战斗，获得以下好处。

items: 当你每只手都挥舞着单独的近战武器时，你会获得一个+1的交流奖励。
即使你所挥舞的单手近战武器不轻，你也可以使用双武器战斗。
你可以抽出或收起两把单手武器，而你通常只能抽出或收起一把。

feat.name: Dungeon Delver
entries: 对许多地牢中的隐藏陷阱和秘密门保持警惕，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你在智慧({@skill Perception})和智力({@skill Investigation})的检查中具有优势，可以发现秘密门的存在。
你在为避免或抵制陷阱而进行的拯救动作中具有优势。
你对陷阱造成的伤害有抵抗力。
Traveling at a fast pace doesn't impose the normal -5 penalty on your passive Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) score.

feat.name: Durable
entries: 坚韧而有弹性，你可以获得以下好处。

items: 当你掷骰子恢复命中率时，你从掷骰子中恢复的最小命中率等于你的体质修正值的两倍（最小为2）。

feat.name: Dwarven Fortitude
entries: 你的血管里流淌着矮人英雄的血液。你获得以下好处。

items: 每当你在战斗中采取{@action Dodge}的行动时，你可以花费一个命中度来治疗自己。掷骰子，加上你的体质修正值，然后恢复与总数相等的命中率（最小值为1）。

feat.name: Eldritch Adept
entries: Studying occult lore, you learn one {@filter Eldritch Invocation|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=EI} option of your choice from the warlock class. Your spellcasting ability for the invocation is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (choose when you select this feat). If the invocation has a prerequisite of any kind, you can choose that invocation only if you're a warlock who meets the prerequisite.
每当你获得一个等级时，你可以用术士类的另一个召唤来替换这个召唤。

feat.name: Elemental Adept
entries: 当你获得此特技时，请选择以下伤害类型之一：酸、冷、火、闪电或雷。
你所施展的法术会忽略对所选类型伤害的抵抗。此外，当你为你所施展的法术造成该类型的伤害而滚动伤害时，你可以将伤害模子上的任何1视为2。
你可以多次选择这项特技。每次你这样做，你必须选择一个不同的伤害类型。

feat.name: Elven Accuracy
entries: 精灵的准确性是传奇性的，尤其是精灵弓箭手和法术师的准确性。你有超乎寻常的瞄准能力，其攻击依靠的是精准而非蛮力。你获得以下好处。

items: 每当你在使用灵巧、智力、智慧或魅力的攻击卷中获得优势时，你可以重新掷出一个骰子一次。

feat.name: Ember of the Fire Giant

feat: strike of the giants|BGG|strike of the giants (fire strike)

entries: 你展现了火巨人的火热战斗力，使你获得以下好处。

items.name: Born of Flame
entries: 你对火灾伤害有抵抗力。

items.name: Searing Ignition
entries: When you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can replace a single attack with a magical burst of flame. Each creature of your choice in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on you must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + the modifier of the ability increased by this feat). On a failed save, a creature takes fire damage equal to {@dice 1d8} + your proficiency bonus, and it has the blinded condition until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only. You can use your Searing Ignition a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus (but no more than once per turn), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Fade Away
entries: 你们的人很聪明，对幻觉魔法很有一套。你已经学会了一种神奇的技巧，当你受到伤害时，可以消逝。你获得以下好处。

items: Immediately after you take damage, you can use a reaction to magically become {@condition invisible} until the end of your next turn or until you attack, deal damage, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this ability, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Fey Teleportation
entries: 你对高等精灵传说的研究释放了精灵的力量，除了你的埃拉德林表亲，其他精灵很少拥有这种力量。利用你的精灵血统，你可以瞬间穿越精灵世界，缩短你从一个地方到另一个地方的路径。你会获得以下好处。

items: You learn to speak, read, and write {@language Sylvan}.
你学会了{@spell misty step}的法术，可以在不消耗法术槽的情况下施放一次。当你完成短时或长时休息时，你重新获得以这种方式施放的能力。智力是你对这个法术的施法能力。

feat.name: Fey Touched
entries: 你接触到精灵世界的魔法改变了你，使你获得了以下好处。

items: 你学会了{@spell misty step}的法术和一个你选择的{@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=E;D}。{@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=E;D}必须是来自占卜或魔法学校。你可以在不耗费法术槽的情况下施展这些法术中的每一个。一旦你以这种方式施展了这些法术中的任何一个，你就不能再以这种方式施展该法术，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。你也可以用你拥有的相应等级的法术槽来施放这些法术。法术的施法能力是由这个特技增加的能力。

feat.name: Fighting Initiate
entries: 你的武术训练帮助你形成了一种特殊的战斗风格。因此，你从战士类中选择一个{@filter Fighting Style|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=FS:F}的选项来学习。如果你已经有了一种风格，你选择的风格必须是不同的。
每当你的等级达到授予能力分数提高功能的时候，你可以用你没有的战士等级中的另一种战斗方式来替换这个特技的战斗方式。

feat.name: Flames of Phlegethos
entries: You learn to call on hellfire to serve your commands. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you roll fire damage for a spell you cast, you can reroll any roll of 1 on the fire damage dice, but you must use the new roll, even if it is another 1.

Whenever you cast a spell that deals fire damage, you can cause flames to wreathe you until the end of your next turn. The flames don't harm you or your possessions, and they shed bright light out to 30 feet and dim light for an additional 30 feet. While the flames are present, any creature within 5 feet of you that hits you with a melee attack takes {@damage 1d4} fire damage.

feat.name: Flash Recall
entries: You've developed the ability to instantly recall an unprepared spell in moments of sudden necessity.

As a bonus action, you prepare a spell of 1st level or higher from your spellbook (if you're a {@class wizard}) or from your class spell list (if you're not a {@class wizard}). This spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots, and it replaces another spell of an equal or higher level that you had previously prepared.
Once you use this feat to recall a spell, you can't do so again until you complete a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.

entries.name: Rules Tip: Prepared Spells
entries: The Flash Recall feat requires you to be a spellcaster who prepares spells. This includes classes such as {@class cleric||clerics}, {@class druid||druids}, and {@class paladin||paladins}, who prepare spells each day from their class list, and {@class wizard||wizards}, who prepare spells from a spellbook. Classes such as {@class bard||bards} and {@class sorcerer||sorcerers}, who inherently know their spells rather than preparing them, can't benefit from this feat.

feat.name: Fury of the Frost Giant

feat: strike of the giants|BGG|strike of the giants (frost strike)

entries: 你展现了冰霜巨人的冰冷力量，使你获得以下好处。

items.name: Born of Ice
entries: 你对寒冷伤害有抵抗力。

items.name: Frigid Retaliation
entries: Immediately after a creature you can see within 30 feet of you hits you with an attack roll and deals damage, you can use your reaction to retaliate with a conjured blast of ice. The creature must make a Constitution saving throw (DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + the modifier of the ability increased by this feat). On a failed save, the creature takes cold damage equal to {@dice 1d8} + your proficiency bonus, and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Gift of the Chromatic Dragon
entries: You've manifested some of the power of chromatic dragons, granting you the following benefits:

items.name: Chromatic Infusion
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你可以触摸一个{@filter simple or martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon;simple weapon}并给它注入以下一种伤害类型：酸、冷、火、雷电或毒。在接下来的一分钟内，当武器击中时，会造成额外的（1%）所选类型的伤害。在你使用这个奖励动作后，你不能再这样做，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

items.name: Reactive Resistance
entries: When you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage, you can use your reaction to give yourself resistance to that instance of damage. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Gift of the Gem Dragon
entries: You've manifested some of the power of gem dragons, granting you the following benefits:

items.name: Telekinetic Reprisal
entries: 当你受到一个在你10英尺范围内的生物的伤害时，你可以用你的反应来发出心灵感应的能量。对你造成伤害的生物必须做一个力量救赎（DC等于8+你的熟练度加分+本特技所增加的能力修饰分）。拯救失败时，该生物会受到{@damage 2d8}武力伤害，并被推到离你最远的10英尺处。拯救成功时，该生物会受到一半的伤害并且不会被推开。你可以使用这个反应的次数等于你的熟练度加成，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有已消耗的使用。

feat.name: Gift of the Metallic Dragon
entries: 你已经体现了金属龙的一些力量，赋予你以下的好处。

items.name: Draconic Healing
entries: You learn the {@spell cure wounds} spell. You can cast this spell without expending a spell slot. Once you cast this spell in this way, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast this spell using spell slots you have. The spell's spellcasting ability is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma when you cast it with this feat (choose when you gain the feat).

items.name: Protective Wings
entries: 你可以显现出保护性的翅膀，可以为你或他人提供保护。当你或你周围5英尺内的其他生物被攻击卷击中时，你可以用你的反应从你的背后显现出幽灵之翼，持续一段时间。你会给予目标一个相当于你的熟练度加成的AC值，以对抗该攻击卷，有可能导致其失误。你可以使用这个反应的次数与你的熟练度加成相等，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有已消耗的使用。

feat.name: Grappler
entries: 你已经发展出必要的技能，可以在近身擒拿中保持自己的优势。你获得以下好处。

items: 你在对你抓捕的生物进行攻击的时候有优势。

You can use your action to try to pin a creature {@condition grappled} by you. To do so, make another grapple check. If you succeed, you and the creature are both {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends.

feat.name: Great Weapon Master
entries: 你已经学会了将武器的重量用于你的优势，让它的动力增强你的打击。你获得以下好处。

items: 在你的回合中，当你用近战武器打出关键一击或将一个生物的命中率降至0时，你可以将一次近战武器攻击作为奖励动作。
在你用你精通的重武器进行近战攻击之前，你可以选择对攻击卷进行-5的惩罚。如果攻击命中，你会在攻击的伤害上增加+10。

feat.name: Guile of the Cloud Giant

feat: strike of the giants|BGG|strike of the giants (cloud strike)

entries: You've manifested the confounding magic emblematic of cloud giants, granting you the following benefits:

items.name: Cloudy Escape
entries: When a creature you can see hits you with an attack roll, you can use your reaction to give yourself resistance to that attack's damage. You then teleport to an unoccupied space that you can see within 30 feet of yourself. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Gunner
entries: 在使用枪械时，你有一双快速的手和敏锐的眼睛，使你获得以下好处。

items: You gain proficiency with firearms (see "{@variantrule Firearms|DMG}" in the Dungeon Master's Guide).
你忽略了枪支的装载特性。
在敌对生物的5英尺范围内，不会对你的远程攻击卷轴造成不利影响。

feat.name: Healer
entries: 你是一个能干的医生，使你能迅速修补伤口，使你的盟友重新投入战斗。你获得以下好处。

items: 当你使用{@item healer's kit|phb}来稳定一个濒临死亡的生物时，该生物也会重新获得1点生命值。
作为一个行动，你可以花费一次{@item healer's kit|phb}来照顾一个生物，为它恢复{@dice 1d6 + 4}的命中率，加上相当于该生物最大命中率的额外命中率。该生物在完成短期或长期休息之前，不能再从这个特技中恢复命中率。

feat.name: Heavily Armored
entries: 你经过训练，掌握了重甲的使用，获得了以下好处。

items: 你获得对重甲的熟练度。

feat.name: Heavy Armor Master
entries: 你可以用你的盔甲来抵挡会杀死他人的攻击。你获得以下好处。

items: 当你穿着重甲时，你从非魔法攻击中受到的打击、穿刺和砍击伤害会减少3。

feat.name: Heavy Glider
entries: You were either born with great strength, or trained hard to allow yourself to glide under circumstances most would find impossible. You gain the following benefits:

items: You may glide while holding a heavy weapon and wearing heavy armor as long as you aren't encumbered.

You may choose to land your glide in a space occupied by a hostile creature that is Large or smaller. If you do so, you may roll an opposed Strength check against the creature. On a success, you push them 10 feet away and knock them {@condition prone} with the force of your impact. On a failure you land in the nearest un-occupied space.

feat.name: Infernal Constitution
entries: 恶魔的血液在你体内流动，释放出类似于某些恶魔所拥有的复原力。你获得以下好处。

items: 你对寒冷和毒药伤害有抵抗力。
You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

feat.name: Initiate of High Sorcery
entries: 你已经接受了隶属于高阶巫术法师的魔法使用者的训练。
从克莱恩的三个月亮中选择一个来影响你的魔法：黑月Nuitari；红月Lunitari；或白月Solinari。你从巫师法术列表中选择一个咒语，并根据你选择的月亮学习两个一级法术，具体内容见月亮法术表。

entries.caption: Lunar Spells
rows: Choose two from {@spell dissonant whispers}, {@spell false life}, {@spell hex}, and {@spell ray of sickness}
Choose two from {@spell color spray}, {@spell disguise self}, {@spell feather fall}, and {@spell longstrider}
Choose two from {@spell comprehend languages}, {@spell detect evil and good}, {@spell protection from evil and good}, and {@spell shield}

entries: 你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放每一个所选的一级法术，你必须在完成一个长时间的休息后才能再次以这种方式施放它们。你也可以使用你拥有的任何法术槽来施展这些法术。
你对这个特技的法术的施法能力是智力、智慧或魅力（在你选择这个特技时选择）。

feat.name: Inspiring Leader
entries: 你可以花10分钟激励你的同伴，增强他们的战斗决心。当你这样做时，在你30英尺范围内选择最多六个友好的生物（可以包括你自己），他们可以看到或听到你，并能理解你。每个生物都可以获得相当于你的等级+你的魅力修改器的临时打击点数。生物在完成短时或长时休息之前，不能再从这个特技中获得临时打击点数。

feat.name: Keen Mind
entries: 你有一个能以不可思议的精确度追踪时间、方向和细节的头脑。你获得以下好处。

items: 你总是知道哪条路是北。
你总是知道离下一次日出或日落还有多少个小时。
你能准确地回忆起过去一个月内看到或听到的任何事情。

feat.name: Keenness of the Stone Giant

feat: strike of the giants|BGG|strike of the giants (stone strike)

entries: 你已经展现了石巨人的身体天赋，赋予你以下的好处。

items.name: Cavernous Sight
entries: You gain {@sense darkvision} with a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision} from another source, its range increases by 60 feet.

items.name: Stone Throw
entries: As a bonus action, you can take a rock and make a magical attack with it. The attack is a ranged spell attack with a range of 60 feet that uses the ability score you increased with this feat as the spellcasting ability. On a hit, the rock deals {@damage 1d10} force damage, and the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + the spellcasting ability modifier) or have the prone condition. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Knight of the Crown
entries: 你是索兰尼亚的一名骑士，与王冠骑士团结盟，该团体推崇合作、忠诚和服从的美德。你擅长团体作战并获得这些好处。

items.name: Commanding Rally
entries: 作为一个额外动作，你可以命令自己30英尺内的一个盟友进行攻击。如果该盟友能看到或听到你，他们可以立即进行一次武器攻击作为反应。如果攻击命中，该盟友可以掷出{@dice d8}，并将掷出的数字作为奖励加入攻击的伤害卷。你可以使用这个奖励动作的次数等于你的熟练度加成，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

entries.name: Membership in Knightly Orders
entries: 索兰尼亚的骑士们永远只属于他们组织中的一个骑士团。在他们的训练过程中，大多数骑士开始是王冠骑士团的成员，然后转而加入其他骑士团。无论一个角色是走这条路还是另一条路，他们都会保留他们作为一个骑士团成员所学到的东西，即使他们加入了另一个骑士团。角色可以改变他们所属的骑士团，但他们总是可以使用他们已经获得的任何索兰尼亚骑士的功绩。

feat.name: Knight of the Rose
entries: 你是索兰尼亚的一名骑士，与玫瑰骑士团结盟，一个以领导力、正义和智慧著称的团体。你的决心赋予你这些好处。

items.name: Bolstering Rally
entries: As a bonus action, you can encourage one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself (you can choose yourself). If the target can see or hear you, the target gains temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier of the ability score increased by this feat. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Membership in Knightly Orders
entries: 索兰尼亚的骑士们永远只属于他们组织中的一个骑士团。在他们的训练过程中，大多数骑士开始是王冠骑士团的成员，然后转而加入其他骑士团。无论一个角色是走这条路还是另一条路，他们都会保留他们作为一个骑士团成员所学到的东西，即使他们加入了另一个骑士团。角色可以改变他们所属的骑士团，但他们总是可以使用他们已经获得的任何索兰尼亚骑士的功绩。

feat.name: Knight of the Sword
entries: 你是索兰尼亚的一名骑士，与剑之团结盟，剑之团致力于英雄主义和勇气。勇敢使你的精神更加坚定，使你获得这些好处。

items.name: Demoralizing Strike
entries: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack roll, you can attempt to frighten that target. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier of the score increased by this feat). On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn. You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Membership in Knightly Orders
entries: 索兰尼亚的骑士们永远只属于他们组织中的一个骑士团。在他们的训练过程中，大多数骑士开始是王冠骑士团的成员，然后转而加入其他骑士团。无论一个角色是走这条路还是另一条路，他们都会保留他们作为一个骑士团成员所学到的东西，即使他们加入了另一个骑士团。角色可以改变他们所属的骑士团，但他们总是可以使用他们已经获得的任何索兰尼亚骑士的功绩。

feat.name: Lightly Armored
entries: 你经过训练，掌握了轻甲的使用，获得了以下好处。

items: 你获得对轻质盔甲的熟练度。

feat.name: Linguist
entries: 你研究过语言和密码，获得了以下好处。

items: 你可以选择学习三种语言。
你可以熟练地创造书面密码。其他人无法破译你创造的密码，除非你教他们，他们成功地进行智力测验（DC等于你的智力得分+你的熟练度加分），或者他们使用魔法来破译它。

feat.name: Lucky
entries: 你有莫名其妙的运气，似乎在适当的时候就会启动。

You have 3 luck points. Whenever you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can spend one luck point to roll an additional {@dice d20}. You can choose to spend one of your luck points after you roll the die, but before the outcome is determined. You choose which of the {@dice d20}s is used for the attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

You can also spend one luck point when an attack roll is made against you. Roll a {@dice d20}, and then choose whether the attack uses the attacker's roll or yours. If more than one creature spends a luck point to influence the outcome of a roll, the points cancel each other out; no additional dice are rolled.
当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复你所消耗的运气值。

feat.name: Mage Slayer
entries: 你已经练习了在近战中对施法者有用的技巧，获得了以下好处。

items: 当你周围5英尺内的生物施法时，你可以用你的反应对该生物进行一次近战武器攻击。
When you damage a creature that is {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain its {@status concentration}.
你对你周围5英尺内的生物所施的法术有优势。

feat.name: Magic Initiate
entries: 选择一个类别。{@filter bard|spells|level=0;1|class=bard}, {@filter cleric|spells|level=0;1|class=cleric}, {@filter druid|spells|level=0;1|class=druid}, {@filter sorcerer|spells|level=0;1|class=sorcerer}, {@filter warlock|spells|level=0;1|class=warlock}, 或 {@filter wizard|spells|level=0;1|class=wizard}。你从该等级的法术列表中选择学习两个咒语。
此外，从同一列表中选择一个一级法术来学习。使用这个特技，你可以在最低等级时施放一次法术，在你再次以这种方式施放之前，你必须完成一次长时间的休息。

你对这些法术的施法能力取决于你选择的等级。魅力为{@filter bard|spells|level=0;1|class=bard}、{@filter sorcerer|spells|level=0;1|class=sorcerer}或{@filter warlock|spells|level=0;1|class=warlock}；智慧为{@filter cleric|spells|level=0;1|class=cleric}或{@filter druid|spells|level=0;1|class=druid}；或智力为{@filter wizard|spells|level=0;1|class=wizard}。

feat.name: Martial Adept
entries: 你的武术训练使你能够进行特殊的战斗演习。你获得以下好处。

items: 你从战士类的{@class fighter|phb|Battle Master|Battle Master|phb|2-0}原型中选择两个{@filter maneuvers|optionalfeatures|feature type=MV:B}进行学习。如果你使用的动作需要你的目标做一个蓄力动作来抵抗该动作的效果，蓄力动作的DC等于8+你的熟练度加成+你的力量或灵巧修饰（你选择）。
你获得一个优势骰子，这是一个{@dice d6}（这个骰子会加到你从其他来源获得的任何优势骰子上）。这个骰子被用来助长你的机动性。当你使用一个优势骰子时，它会被消耗掉。当你完成一个短期或长期的休息时，你会重新获得你所消耗的优势骰子。

feat.name: Medium Armor Master
entries: 你已经练习了在中型盔甲中移动，以获得以下好处。

items: 穿着中型盔甲不会对你的灵巧({@skill Stealth})检查造成不利影响。
当你穿上中型盔甲时，如果你的灵巧度达到16或更高，你可以在你的AC上增加3，而不是2。

feat.name: Metamagic Adept
entries: 你已经学会了如何对你的法术施加你的意志来改变它们的运作方式。

items: You learn two {@filter Metamagic|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=MM} options of your choice from the sorcerer class. You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless the option says otherwise. Whenever you reach a level that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can replace one of these Metamagic options with another one from the sorcerer class.
你获得2个巫术点数，可以用在魔法上（这些点数会加到你从其他来源获得的任何巫术点数上，但只能用于魔法）。当你完成长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有花费的巫术点数。

feat.name: Mobile
entries: 你的速度特别快，而且很敏捷。你获得以下好处。

items: 你的速度增加10英尺。
当你使用{@action Dash}行动时，{@quickref difficult terrain||3}在该回合不会让你付出额外的行动。
当你对一个生物进行近战攻击时，无论你是否命中，你在回合的剩余时间内都不会激起该生物的机会攻击。

feat.name: Moderately Armored
entries: 你经过训练，掌握了中型盔甲和盾牌的使用，获得了以下好处。

items: 你获得对中型盔甲和盾牌的熟练度。

feat.name: Mounted Combatant
entries: 你在骑马时是个危险的敌人。当你骑着马而不是{@condition incapacitated}时，你获得以下好处。

items: 你对任何比你的坐骑小的非坐骑生物的近战攻击卷有优势。
你可以强迫以你的坐骑为目标的攻击转而针对你。
如果你的坐骑受到的效果允许它做一个灵巧的蓄力动作来承受一半的伤害，那么如果它蓄力动作成功，它就不会受到伤害，如果它失败，就只会受到一半的伤害。

feat.name: Mystic Conflux
entries: You possess an intuitive understanding of the way magic ebbs and flows within enchanted items. Such items attune easily to you, and you are able to sound out their secrets. You gain the following benefits:

items: You can attune to up to four magic items at once.
You can cast the {@spell identify} spell without expending a spell slot or material components. You must finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|long rest} before you can do so again.

feat.name: Observant
entries: 迅速注意到环境中的细节，你会获得以下好处。

items: 如果你能看到一个生物的嘴，而它正在说一种你能理解的语言，你可以通过阅读它的嘴唇来解释它在说什么。
You have a +5 bonus to your passive Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) and passive Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) scores.

feat.name: Opportunistic Thief
entries: You have learned the tricks of the trade of thievery, allowing you to exploit opportunities for pick-pocketing both in and out of combat. You gain the following benefits:

items: When a creature fails a melee attack roll against you in combat, you can make a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check against a DC equal to 10 + the target's Dexterity modifier. On a success, you may steal any one item that is not being held or worn by the target.

Whenever you successfully use your {@skill Sleight of Hand} skill outside of combat to steal an object, you may immediately conceal it flawlessly on your person, or put another object you possess in its place.

feat.name: Orcish Fury
entries: 你的怒火不知疲倦地燃烧着。你获得以下好处。

items: 当你使用{@filter simple or martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon;simple weapon}的攻击命中时，你可以额外掷出武器的一个伤害骰子，并将其作为武器的伤害类型的额外伤害。一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。
在你使用你的无情耐力特质后，你可以立即使用你的反应来进行一次武器攻击。

feat.name: Outlands Envoy

feat: scion of the outer planes|sato|scion of the outer planes (the outlands)

entries: You have spent significant time in Sigil or the Outlands, the crossroads of the multiverse. Being steeped in converging planar energies grants you these benefits:

items.name: Crossroads Emissary
entries: You learn the {@spell misty step} and {@spell tongues} spells. You can cast each spell once using this feat without a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast that spell in this way again. When you cast {@spell tongues} using this feat, you require no material components. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells' spellcasting ability is the one chosen when you gained the Scion of the Outer Planes feat.

feat.name: Perfect Landing
entries: Years of living at great heights have taught you how to fall more gracefully. You gain the following benefits:

items: Reduce the damage die for fall damage from a d6 to a d4.
You do not fall prone after taking falling damage.
You do not take damage for the first 30 feet of your fall.

feat.name: Piercer
entries: 你在战斗中达到了透彻的精确性，使你获得以下好处。

items: 每回合一次，当你用造成穿刺伤害的攻击击中一个生物时，你可以重新掷出攻击的一个伤害骰子，并且你必须使用新的骰子。
当你的关键一击对一个生物造成穿刺伤害时，你可以在决定目标受到的额外穿刺伤害时，滚动一个额外的伤害模子。

feat.name: Planar Wanderer
entries: You can draw on the forces of the multiverse to survive cosmic extremes and to traverse its infinite realms, granting you these benefits:

items.name: Planar Adaptation
entries: 当你完成长期休息时，你获得对酸、冷或火伤害的抗性（你选择），直到你完成下一次长期休息。

items.name: Portal Cracker
entries: Your experience with portals allows you to open them without a portal key. As an action, you can concentrate on a portal you're aware of that is within 5 feet of yourself and make a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check. On a failed check, you take {@damage 3d8} psychic damage and can't use this benefit on that portal again until you finish a long rest. On a successful check, you can force the portal open or closed for 1 hour. For that duration, the portal doesn't respond to its portal key unless a creature employing the key succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check as an action.

items.name: Portal Sense
entries: You know the direction to the last planar portal you used while you and the portal are on the same plane of existence. Moreover, as an action, you can detect the location of any portals within 30 feet of you that aren't behind total cover. Once you detect a portal with this action, you can't use the action again until you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Poisoner
entries: 你可以准备和提供致命的毒药，给予你以下的好处。

items: 当你做一个造成毒药伤害的伤害卷时，它无视对毒药伤害的抵抗。
你可以对武器或弹药施加毒药，作为一个额外动作，而不是一个动作。

You gain proficiency with the {@item poisoner's kit|phb} if you don't already have it. With one hour of work using a {@item poisoner's kit|phb} and expending 50 gp worth of materials, you can create a number of doses of potent poison equal to your proficiency bonus. Once applied to a weapon or piece of ammunition, the poison retains its potency for 1 minute or until you hit with the weapon or ammunition. When a creature takes damage from the coated weapon or ammunition, that creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Polearm Master
entries: 你可以用伸手不见五指的武器让你的敌人望而却步。你获得以下好处。

items: 当你采取{@action Attack}行动并只用{@item glaive|phb}、{@item halberd|phb}、{@item quarterstaff|phb}或{@item spear|phb}进行攻击时，你可以使用一个额外行动，用武器的另一端进行近战攻击；这次攻击使用与主攻击相同的能力修改器。这次攻击的武器伤害模数为{@dice d4}，攻击造成重击伤害。
当你挥舞{@item glaive|phb}、{@item halberd|phb}、{@item pike|phb}、{@item quarterstaff|phb}或{@item spear|phb}的武器时，其他生物进入你的武器范围时，会引发你的一次机会攻击。

feat.name: Prodigy
entries: 你有学习新事物的诀窍。你会获得以下好处。

items: 你获得一个{@table skills|phb|skill proficiency}的选择，一个{@filter tool proficiency|items|type=tool;artisan's tools}的选择，以及你选择的一种语言的流利程度。
选择一个你已经熟练掌握的技能。你获得该技能的专长，这意味着你用该技能进行任何能力检查时，你的熟练度加成都会翻倍。你选择的技能必须是一个还没有受益于某种特性的技能，比如说 "专长"，它可以使你的熟练度加分翻倍。

feat.name: Quicksmithing
entries: 你已经掌握了即时发明、改进和偷工减料的艺术。只要有时间和充足的乙醚供应，你可以利用你的天赋创造出类似于法术的即时、短期的魔法效果。
当你选择这项特技时，你掌握了两个魔法效果，每个效果都能重现一个具有仪式标签的一级法术的效果。这些法术可以来自任何类别的列表，但智力是你对它们的施法能力。
如果你遇到一个针对流星锤的原理图，或者向另一个流星锤学习，你也许能在你掌握的效果上再加一个法术。这个法术的等级不能高于你等级的一半（四舍五入），而且必须有仪式标签。掌握法术的过程中，每一级的法术需要2小时，每一级需要花费50金币。该费用代表你在实验法术效果时使用的乙太，以掌握它。
此外，你对{@item artisan's tools|PHB}(流星锤工具)的熟练程度。使用这些工具，你可以花1小时和价值10戈比的材料来建造一个微小的发条装置（AC 5，1马力）。该装置在24小时后停止工作，除非你花1小时修理它以保持其功能。你可以用你的行动来拆除这个装置，这时你可以回收用来制造它的材料。你一次最多可以拥有三个这样的装置。
当你创建一个设备时，选择以下选项之一。

entries.name: Clockwork Toy
entries: 这个玩具是一个发条动物、怪物或人，如青蛙、老鼠、鸟、龙或士兵。当放置在地面上时，该玩具在你每个回合都会在地面上以随机方向移动5英尺。它发出的声音与它所代表的生物相应。

entries.name: Fire Starter
entries: 这个装置会产生一个微型火焰，你可以用它来点燃蜡烛、火把或营火。使用这个装置需要你的行动。

entries.name: Music Box
entries: 当打开时，这个音乐盒以适度的音量播放一首歌曲。当它达到歌曲的终点或关闭时，盒子就会停止播放。

feat.name: Remarkable Recovery
entries: Your body has the ability to recover quickly from terrible injuries, and is unusually receptive to healing magic. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you are successfully stabilized while dying, you regain hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1).
Whenever you regain hit points as a result of a spell, potion, or class feature (but not this feat), you regain additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1).

feat.name: Resilient

choose.entry: 将所选择的能力分数提高1，最高为20。

entries: 选择一个能力得分。你获得以下好处。

items: 你在使用所选择的能力时获得熟练的救赎动作。

feat.name: Revenant Blade
entries: 你是一位{@item double-bladed scimitar|ERLW}大师的后裔，该大师的一些技能已经传给了你。你获得以下好处。

items: 当你双手持双刃弯刀时，你获得+1的装甲等级加成。
当你挥舞双刃弯刀时，它具有细腻的属性。

feat.name: Righteous Heritor

feat: scion of the outer planes|sato|scion of the outer planes (good outer plane)

entries: You can channel cosmic forces of good to gain these benefits:

items.name: Soothe Pain
entries: When you or a creature within 30 feet of you takes damage, you can use your reaction to reduce that damage by {@dice 1d10} + your proficiency bonus. You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Ritual Caster
entries: 你已经学会了一些咒语，你可以作为仪式来施展这些咒语。这些法术都写在一本仪式书中，你在施放其中一个法术时必须拿着它。

当你选择这项特技时，你会获得一本装有两个你选择的一级法术的仪式书。从以下类别中选择一个。{@filter bard|spells|level=1|class=bard|components & miscellaneous=ritual}, {@filter cleric|spells|level=1|class=cleric|components & miscellaneous=ritual}, {@filter druid|spells|level=1|class=druid|components & miscellaneous=ritual}, {@filter sorcerer|spells|level=1|class=sorcerer|components & miscellaneous=ritual}, {@filter warlock|spells|level=1|class=warlock|components & miscellaneous=ritual} 或 {@filter wizard|spells|level=1|class=wizard|components & miscellaneous=ritual}。你必须从该等级的法术列表中选择你的法术，而且你选择的法术必须有仪式标签。你选择的类别也决定了你对这些法术的施法能力。吟游诗人、巫师或术士的魅力；牧师或德鲁伊的智慧；或巫师的智力。

If you come across a spell in written form, such as a magical {@item spell scroll} or a wizard's spellbook, you might be able to add it to your ritual book. The spell must be on the spell list for the class you chose, the spell's level can be no higher than half your level (rounded up), and it must have the ritual tag. The process of copying the spell into your ritual book takes 2 hours per level of the spell, and costs 50 gp per level. The cost represents material components you expend as you experiment with the spell to master it, as well as the fine inks you need to record it.

feat.name: Rune Shaper
entries: You've studied the magic of Giant runes, granting you the following benefits:

items.name: Comprehend Languages
entries: You learn the {@spell comprehend languages} spell. You can cast this spell without expending a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast this spell using any spell slots you have.

items.name: Rune Magic
entries: You know a number of runes equal to half your proficiency bonus (rounded down), chosen from the Rune Spells table. Whenever you finish a long rest, you can inscribe each rune you know onto one nonmagical weapon, armor, piece of clothing, or other object you touch. You temporarily learn the 1st-level spells that correspond to the runes you inscribed, as specified on the Rune Spells table, and you know those spells until you finish a long rest, when the runes fade. While you are wearing or carrying any rune-marked object, you can cast the spells associated with those runes using any spell slots you have.

You can also invoke a rune inscribed on an object you are wearing or carrying and cast its associated spell without expending a spell slot or using material components. Once you cast the spell in this way, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. Your spellcasting ability for this feat is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (choose when you select this feat).
Each time you gain a level, you can replace one of the runes you know with another one from the Rune Spells table.

feat.name: Savage Attacker
entries: 每回合一次，当你为近战武器攻击掷出伤害时，你可以重新掷出武器的伤害骰子，并使用其中一个总数。

feat.name: Scion of the Outer Planes
entries: Your connection to an Outer Plane infuses you with the energy there. Choose a type of plane listed in the Planar Infusion table. Your choice gives you resistance to a damage type and the ability to cast a cantrip, as specified in the table. You can cast this cantrip without material components, and your spellcasting ability for it is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (choose when you select this feat).

feat.name: Second Chance
entries: 当有人试图打击你时，命运会眷顾你。你会获得以下好处。

items: 当一个你能看到的生物用攻击卷打中你时，你可以用你的反应来迫使该生物重新滚动。一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你在战斗开始时掷出主动权，或者直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

feat.name: Sentinel
entries: 你已经掌握了在任何敌人的防守中利用每一个漏洞的技术，获得了以下好处。

items: 当你用机会攻击击中一个生物时，该生物的速度在回合的剩余时间内变为0。
Creatures provoke opportunity attacks from you even if they take the {@action Disengage} action before leaving your reach.
当你周围5英尺内的生物对你以外的目标进行攻击时（且该目标没有此特技），你可以使用你的反应对攻击的生物进行近战武器攻击。

feat.name: Servo Crafting
entries: You are skilled in the creation of {@creature servo|psk|servos}—tiny constructs that function as personal assistants. You can cast the {@spell find familiar} spell as a ritual, creating a {@creature servo|psk} to serve as your familiar instead of an animal. A {@creature servo|psk}'s statistics appear in the "Artifact Creatures" section of this document. In every other way, a servo familiar functions as described in the {@spell find familiar} spell.
只要你们在同一个存在平面上，你就能与你熟悉的伺服机进行心灵感应，并通过其感官进行感知。你可以通过你的伺服机用自己的声音说话。
此外，当你采取{@action Attack}的行动时，你可以放弃你自己的一次攻击，以允许你的伺服熟悉物进行一次自己的攻击。

feat.name: Shadow Touched
entries: 你对影子城的魔法的接触改变了你，使你获得了以下好处。

items: 你学会了{@spell invisibility}的法术和一个你选择的{@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=I;N}。{@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=I;N}必须是来自幻术或死灵学派的魔法。你可以在不耗费法术槽的情况下施展这些法术中的每一个。一旦你以这种方式施展了这些法术中的任何一个，你就不能再以这种方式施展该法术，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。你也可以用你拥有的相应等级的法术槽来施放这些法术。法术的施法能力是由这个特技增加的能力。

feat.name: Sharpshooter
entries: 你已经掌握了远程武器，可以进行别人认为不可能的射击。你获得以下好处。

items: 远距离攻击不会对你的远程武器攻击卷轴造成不利影响。
你的远程武器攻击无视半掩体和四分之三掩体。
在你使用你精通的远程武器进行攻击之前，你可以选择对攻击卷进行-5的惩罚。如果攻击命中，你会在攻击的伤害上增加+10。

feat.name: Shield Master
entries: 你使用盾牌不仅仅是为了保护，也是为了进攻。当你挥舞{@item shield|phb}时，你获得以下好处。

items: 如果你在你的回合中采取{@action Attack}的行动，你可以使用一个额外的行动，尝试用你的盾牌对你5英尺内的生物进行{@action shove}。
If you aren't {@condition incapacitated}, you can add your shield's AC bonus to any Dexterity saving throw you make against a spell or other harmful effect that targets only you.
如果你受到的效果允许你做一个灵巧的蓄力动作来承受一半的伤害，如果你蓄力动作成功，你可以使用你的反应来不受伤害，在你和效果的来源之间插入你的盾牌。

feat.name: Skill Expert
entries: 你已经磨练了你对特定技能的熟练程度，赋予你以下好处。

items: You gain proficiency in one {@table skills|phb|skill} of your choice.
选择一个你已经熟练掌握的技能。你获得该技能的专长，这意味着你用该技能进行任何能力检查时，你的熟练度加成都会翻倍。你选择的技能必须是一个还没有受益于某种特性的技能，比如说 "专长"，它可以使你的熟练度加分翻倍。

feat.name: Skilled
entries: You gain proficiency in any combination of three {@table skills|phb} or {@filter tools|items|type=tools;artisan's tools;instrument;gaming set;vehicle (land);vehicle (water)} of your choice.

feat.name: Skulker
entries: 你是在阴影中溜达的专家。你获得以下好处。

items: 当你被你要躲避的生物轻度遮挡时，你可以尝试躲避。
当你躲避一个生物，并且用远程武器攻击错过它时，进行攻击不会暴露你的位置。
昏暗的光线不会对你依赖视觉的智慧({@skill Perception})检查造成不利影响。

feat.name: Slasher
entries: 你已经学会了在哪里切割才能有最大的效果，给予你以下好处。

items: 每回合一次，当你用攻击击中一个生物并造成砍击伤害时，你可以将目标的速度降低10英尺，直到你下一回合开始。
当你的关键一击对一个生物造成砍击伤害时，你会使它严重受伤。在你下一个回合开始之前，目标在所有攻击卷轴上都处于劣势。

feat.name: Soul of the Storm Giant

feat: strike of the giants|BGG|strike of the giants (storm strike)

entries: You've manifested the tempest magic emblematic of storm giants, granting you the following benefits:

items.name: Maelstrom Aura
entries: As a bonus action, you surround yourself with an aura of magical wind and lightning that extends 10 feet from you in every direction but not through total cover. The aura lasts until the start of your next turn or until you are incapacitated. While the aura is active, you have resistance to lightning and thunder damage. In addition, attack rolls against you have disadvantage, and whenever another creature starts its turn within the aura, you can force the creature to make a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + the modifier of the ability increased by this feat). On a failed save, the creature's speed is halved until the start of its next turn. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Speech of the Ancient Beasts
entries: You have a special connection with the natural world. Great beasts regard you as their kin, and you possess the ability to speak the languages of the most powerful and mystic of their kind. You gain the following benefits:

items: Beasts of Large size or larger have a friendly disposition toward you unless you have attacked them.
You have advantage on Charisma checks made against beasts that are of Large size or larger.

You can speak and understand Giant Eagle, Giant Elk, and Giant Owl. You can otherwise be understood by any beast of Large size or larger, whether or not they speak a language. Beasts with Intelligence scores of 4 or lower may only be able to understand simple concepts.

feat.name: Spell Sniper
entries: 你已经学会了用某些种类的法术增强你的攻击的技巧，获得了以下好处。

items: 当你施展一个需要你进行攻击卷的法术时，该法术的范围会加倍。
你的远程法术攻击无视半掩体和四分之三掩体。

你学习一个需要攻击卷的咒语。从{@filter bard|spells|level=0|class=bard|spell attack=m;r;o}、{@filter cleric|spells|level=0|class=cleric|spell attack=m;r;o}、{@filter druid|spells|level=0|class=druid|spell attack=m;r;o}、{@filter sorcerer|spells|level=0|class=sorcerer|spell attack=m;r;o}、{@filter warlock|spells|level=0|class=warlock|spell attack=m;r;o}或{@filter wizard|spells|level=0|class=wizard|spell attack=m;r;o}的法术列表中选择该咒语。你对这个咒语的施法能力取决于你选择的咒语列表：吟游诗人、巫师或术士的魅力；牧师或德鲁伊的智慧；或巫师的智力。

feat.name: Spelldriver
entries: Through intense focus, training, and dedication, you've harnessed the techniques of rapid spellcasting.

When you use your bonus action to cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you can also use your action to cast another spell of 1st level or higher. However, if you cast two or more spells in a single turn, only one of them can be 3rd level or higher.

entries.name: Rules Tip: Casting Multiple Spells
entries: Normally, when you cast a spell as a bonus action, you can't use your action to also cast a spell that turn unless that spell is a cantrip—{@note see {@book PHB p202|PHB|10|Bonus Action}.} The Spelldriver feat removes that restriction, but the focus necessary to channel multiple spells in the same round still limits the overall power of those spells.

feat.name: Squat Nimbleness
entries: 对于你的种族来说，你是不寻常的灵活。你获得以下好处。

items: 将你的行走速度提高5英尺。
你获得{@skill Acrobatics}或{@skill Athletics}技能的熟练度（你选择）。
你在任何力量({@skill Athletics})或灵巧({@skill Acrobatics})的检查中都有优势，以逃避被{@condition grappled}。

feat.name: Squire of Solamnia
entries: 你在索兰尼亚骑士团的训练中获得了这些好处。

items.name: Mount Up
entries: 安装或卸载只需花费5英尺的移动距离。

items.name: Precise Strike
entries: Once per turn, when you make a weapon attack roll against a creature, you can cause the attack roll to have advantage. If the attack hits, you roll a {@dice d8} and add the number rolled as a bonus to the attack's damage roll. You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, but a use is expended only if the attack hits. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Membership in Knightly Orders
entries: 索兰尼亚的骑士们永远只属于他们组织中的一个骑士团。在他们的训练过程中，大多数骑士开始是王冠骑士团的成员，然后转而加入其他骑士团。无论一个角色是走这条路还是另一条路，他们都会保留他们作为一个骑士团成员所学到的东西，即使他们加入了另一个骑士团。角色可以改变他们所属的骑士团，但他们总是可以使用他们已经获得的任何索兰尼亚骑士的功绩。

feat.name: Strike of the Giants
entries: You have absorbed primeval magic that gives you an echo of the might of giants. When you take this feat, choose one of the benefits listed below. Once per turn, when you hit a target with a melee weapon attack or a ranged weapon attack using a thrown weapon, you can imbue the attack with an additional effect depending on the benefit you chose:

entries.name: Cloud Strike
entries: The target takes an extra {@damage 1d4} thunder damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or you become invisible to it until the start of your next turn or until immediately after you make an attack roll or cast a spell.

entries.name: Fire Strike
entries: The target takes an extra {@damage 1d10} fire damage.

entries.name: Frost Strike
entries: 目标会受到额外的{@damage 1d6}寒冷伤害。如果目标是生物，它必须在宪法规定的救赎中成功，否则它的速度将被降低到0，直到你下一个回合开始。

entries.name: Hill Strike
entries: The target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the weapon's type. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

entries.name: Stone Strike
entries: The target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet from you in a straight line.

entries.name: Storm Strike
entries: 目标会受到额外的{@damage 1d6}雷电伤害。如果目标是生物，它必须在宪法规定的救赎中成功，否则在你下一回合开始前，它在攻击卷中处于不利地位。
这些效果的蓄力DC等于8+你的熟练度加成+你的力量或体质修正值。
You can use this feat a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Strixhaven Initiate
entries: 你学习过一些魔法理论，并学会了一些与斯特里克斯海文大学有关的法术。
选择Strixhaven的一所学院。Lorehold, Prismari, Quandrix, Silverquill, 或Witherbloom。你会根据你选择的学院学习两个咒语和一个一级法术，具体内容见Strixhaven法术表。
你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放所选择的一级法术，而你必须在完成一个长时间的休息后才能再次以这种方式施放它。你也可以使用你拥有的任何法术槽来施放该法术。
你对这个特技的法术的施法能力是智力、智慧或魅力（在你选择这个特技时选择）。

entries.caption: Strixhaven Spells
rows: Choose two from {@spell light}, {@spell sacred flame}, and {@spell thaumaturgy}.
Choose two from {@spell fire bolt}, {@spell prestidigitation}, and {@spell ray of frost}.
Choose two from {@spell druidcraft}, {@spell guidance}, and {@spell mage hand}.
Choose one 1st-level {@filter druid or wizard spell|spells|level=1|class=druid;wizard}.
Choose two from {@spell sacred flame}, {@spell thaumaturgy}, and {@spell vicious mockery}.
Choose one 1st-level {@filter bard or cleric spell|spells|level=1|class=bard;cleric}.
Choose two from {@spell chill touch}, {@spell druidcraft}, and {@spell spare the dying}.
Choose one 1st-level {@filter druid or wizard spell|spells|level=1|class=druid;wizard}.

feat.name: Strixhaven Mascot
entries: 你已经学会了如何召唤一个Strixhaven吉祥物来协助你，给予你这些好处。

items: 你可以将{@spell find familiar}的法术作为一种仪式来施展。你的熟悉物可以采取与你为Strixhaven Initiate feat选择的学院相关的吉祥物的形式：一个{@creature spirit statue mascot|scc}（Lorehold），一个{@creature art elemental mascot|scc}（Prismari），一个{@creature fractal mascot|scc}（Quandrix），一个{@creature inkling mascot|scc}（Silverquill），或者一个{@creature pest mascot|scc}（Witherbloom）。
当你在你的回合中采取{@action Attack}行动时，你可以放弃一次攻击，让你的吉祥物熟悉的人用它的反应做出一次自己的攻击。
如果你的吉祥物在你的60英尺范围内，你可以作为一个动作进行传送，与吉祥物交换位置。如果你的目的地空间太小，你无法占据，那么传送就会失败并被浪费掉。一旦你以这种方式传送，你就不能再这样做了，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，除非你消耗一个2级或更高级别的法术槽来再次进行传送。

feat.name: Svirfneblin Magic
entries: You have inherited the innate spellcasting ability of your ancestors. This ability allows you to cast {@spell nondetection} on yourself at will, without needing a material component. You can also cast each of the following spells once with this ability: {@spell blindness/deafness}, {@spell blur}, and {@spell disguise self}. You regain the ability to cast these spells when you finish a long rest.
智力是你对这些法术的施法能力，你以它们的最低等级施法。

feat.name: Tavern Brawler
entries: 习惯于使用手边的任何武器进行粗暴的战斗，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你能熟练使用简易武器。
你的徒手攻击使用{@damage d4}进行伤害。
当你在你的回合中用徒手攻击或简易武器击中一个生物时，你可以使用一个额外的行动来尝试抓取目标。

feat.name: Telekinetic
entries: 你学会用你的思想来移动东西，赋予你以下好处。

items: You learn the {@spell mage hand} cantrip. You can cast it without verbal or somatic components, and you can make the spectral hand {@condition invisible}. If you already know this spell, its range increases by 30 feet when you cast it. Its spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.
作为一个额外的动作，你可以尝试用心灵感应来推搡你周围30英尺内你能看到的一个生物。当你这样做的时候，目标必须成功地进行力量救赎（DC8+你的熟练度加分+本特技所增加的能力修饰），或者被移向你或远离你5英尺。一个生物可以自愿不做这个救赎。

feat.name: Telepathic
entries: 你唤醒了在精神上与他人联系的能力，赋予你以下的好处。

items: 你可以对你周围60英尺内你能看到的任何生物进行心灵感应。你的心灵感应是以你所知道的语言进行的，而该生物只有在知道该语言的情况下才能理解你。你的交流并不能让生物有能力以心灵感应的方式回应你。

You can cast the {@spell detect thoughts} spell, requiring no spell slot or components, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it this way again. Your spellcasting ability for the spell is the ability increased by this feat. If you have spell slots of 2nd level or higher, you can cast this spell with them.

feat.name: Thrown Arms Master
entries: You've honed your ability to lob weaponry into the fray, including weapons not meant for ranged combat. You gain the following benefits:

items: Simple and martial melee weapons without the thrown property have the thrown property for you. One-handed weapons have a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet, while two-handed weapons have a normal range of 15 feet and a long range of 30 feet.
Weapons that already have the thrown property increase their short range by 20 feet and their long range by 40 feet for you.

When you miss with a thrown weapon attack using a light weapon, the weapon returns to your grasp like a boomerang at the end of your turn, unless something prevents it from returning. You can catch and stow as many weapons as you threw in this way.

feat.name: Tough
entries: 当你获得这项特技时，你的最大命中率会增加相当于你等级的两倍。此后每当你获得一个等级，你的最大命中率会额外增加2个命中率。

feat.name: Vampiric Exultation
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以将你的下半身变成一个墨黑色的水汽，让你在空中漂浮。在变身时，你的飞行速度为30英尺。你可以保持这种形态达10分钟之久。一旦你使用这个能力，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

feat.name: Vigor of the Hill Giant

feat: strike of the giants|BGG|strike of the giants (hill strike)

entries: 你已经表现出山丘巨人的弹性，赋予你以下的好处。

items.name: Bulwark
entries: When you are subjected to an effect that would move you at least 5 feet or give you the prone condition, you can use your reaction to steady yourself. You aren't moved and don't have the prone condition.

items.name: Iron Stomach
entries: 每当你在短时休息中吃了食物，并花费一个或多个命中率骰子来恢复命中率时，你就会恢复相当于你的体质修正因子+你的熟练度加成的额外命中率。

feat.name: Vital Sacrifice
entries: You've learned secrets of {@variantrule hemocraft|TDCSR} that grant you esoteric power at the price of your own life force. As a bonus action, you can choose to take {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage to gain a blood boon. Your blood boon lasts for 1 hour or until expended.
You can expend this blood boon to gain one of the following benefits:

items: When you make an attack roll, you roll {@dice 1d6} and add it to the total.
When you hit with an attack or spell, you deal an additional {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage.
When you cause a creature to make a Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}, roll a {@dice d4} and reduce their save by the amount rolled.

entries: The damage you take to gain a blood boon can't be reduced in any way.

feat.name: War Caster
entries: 你在战斗中练习施法，学习的技巧能给你带来以下好处。

items: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your {@status concentration} on a spell when you take damage.
即使你的一只手或两只手拿着武器或{@item shield|phb}，你也可以执行法术的体质成分。
当一个敌对生物的行动激起你的机会攻击时，你可以用你的反应向该生物施放一个法术，而不是进行机会攻击。该法术的施法时间必须为1个动作，并且必须只针对该生物。

feat.name: Weapon Master
entries: 你已经广泛地练习了各种武器，获得了以下好处。

items: 你获得对你选择的四种武器的熟练度。每件武器必须是简单的或武术的武器。

feat.name: Wood Elf Magic
entries: 你学会了原始森林的魔法，这些森林受到你的人民的敬重和保护。你学会了一个你选择的德鲁伊咒语。你还学会了{@spell longstrider}和{@spell pass without trace}的法术，每个法术你都可以施放一次而不需要消耗一个法术槽。当你完成一次长时间的休息时，你会重新获得以这种方式施放这两个法术的能力。智慧是你对所有三种法术的施法能力。

feat.name: Woodwise
entries: You have lived your entire life in the gnarled, wooded areas of the world. You are adept at finding your way through even the most treacherous terrain. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in either the {@skill Survival} or {@skill Nature} skill.
You ignore difficult terrain.
You cannot become lost in natural surroundings except by magical means.
